description:
"Vampire Diaries" spinoff "The Originals," Mary, Queen of Scots retelling "Reign," and supernatural remake "The Tomorrow People" -- have been picked up for full 22-episode seasons.CW宣布全季续订衍生剧《初代吸血鬼》、苏格兰玛丽女王故事《风中女王》和超自然美剧《未来青年》，这3部美剧今年将会有22集。

Says CW president Mark Pedowitz in a press release, "We're excited about the creative momentum the producers have established for all three of our new series, and now our fans will have the chance to see the full stories unfold for them this season. With the additional episodes ordered, plus two new dramas and new reality for midseason, we'll be able to continue our commitment to adding more original programming all year long."CW电视台总裁Mark Pedowitz在发布会上说，“我们对这些新剧的势头非常看好，而我们的观众们现在有机会欣赏着3部美剧的首季完整预定。这3部增加预定的美剧再加上之前已经确定新制作的2部，我们很高兴看到今年我们可以看到更多原创节目播出。

The CW boasts in its press release that it is up 9 percent from last year in total viewers, and 31 percent of its audience watches the shows after their original air dates on DVR. These newly picked up shows have 84 percent more digital viewing than last year's new shows.CW同时还在发布会上公布，去年一年CW的收视份额大约为9%，31%的观众会选择看重播。新开剧集比之前一年的剧集收视提高了84%。

title: CW全季预定《初代吸血鬼》3部美剧
